WorkloadProfile.Description: Select this option to change the Workload Profile to accommodate your desired workload.

BootMode.Description: Sets boot mode of the system

FCScanPolicy.Description: Scan configured or all FC targets

PciSlot1Enable.Description: Enables or disables HBA Mezzanine card

PciSlot1LinkSpeed.Description: Enables or disables link speed for HBA Mezzanine card

PciSlot1OptionROM.Description: Enables or disables option ROM for HBA Mezzanine card

PciSlot2Enable.Description: Enables or disables HBA Mezzanine card

PciSlot2LinkSpeed.Description: Enables or disables link speed for HBA Mezzanine card

PciSlot2OptionROM.Description: Enables or disables option ROM for HBA Mezzanine card

PciSlot3Enable.Description: Enables or disables HBA Mezzanine card

PciSlot3LinkSpeed.Description: Enables or disables link speed for HBA Mezzanine card

PciSlot3OptionROM.Description: Enables or disables option ROM for HBA Mezzanine card

VirtualInstallDisk.Description: When enabled it may appear as a drive to the OS affecting installs

ProcHyperthreading.Description: When enabled each physical processor core operates as two logical processor cores

IntelProcVtd.Description: Uses hardware capabilities provided by Intel Virtualization technology for directed I/O

Sriov.Description: Enables a hypervisor to create virtual instances of a PCI-express device, potentially increasing performance

VirtualSerialPort.Description: Assigns the logical COM port address and associated default resources used by VSP

ServerName.Description: Server name as displayed in the iLO and BIOS

PowerRegulator.Description: Select this option to change the power/performance state of the server.

MinProcIdlePower.Description: Select this option to change the the lowest idle power state (C-state) of the processor that the operating system uses.

MinProcIdlePkgState.Description: Select this option to change the lowest idle package package power state (C-state) of the processor.

EnergyPerfBias.Description: Select this option to change processor subsystems to optimize the performance and power usage of the processor.

CollabPowerControl.Description: Select this option to enable the OS to request processor frequency changes on servers with Power Regulator option on and Dynamic Power Savings Mode enabled.

IntelNicDmaChannels.Description: Select this option to enable Intel NIC DMA Channels support.

HwPrefetcher.Description: Select this option to change the processor HW prefetch feature.

AdjSecPrefetch.Description: Select this option to change the processor Adjacent Sector Prefetch feature.

DcuStreamPrefetcher.Description: Select this option to change the processor DCU Stream Prefetcher feature.

DcuIpPrefetcher.Description: Select this option to change the processor DCU IP Prefetcher feature.

NumaGroupSizeOpt.Description: Select this option to change how the System BIOS reports the size of a NUMA node

IntelUpiPowerManagement.Description: Select this option to change how the Quick Path Interconnect (UPI) links consume power when the links are not being used.

EnergyEfficientTurbo.Description: Select this option to change the energy policy used when engaging turbo range frequencies.

UncoreFreqScaling.Description: Select this option to change the frequency scaling of the processor's internal busses (the uncore).

IntelDmiLinkFreq.Description: Select this option to change the link speed between the processor and the southbridge.

ProcTurbo.Description: Select this option to enable the processor to transition to a higher frequency than the processor's rated speed.

MemPatrolScrubbing.Description: Select this option to enable or disable the correcting of memory soft errors.

MemRefreshRate.Description: Select this option to control the refresh rate of the memory controller.

SubNumaClustering.Description: Select this option to control the dividing of the processor's cores, cache, and memory into multiple NUMA domains.

ProcX2Apic.Description: Select this option to configure the operating system to optionally enable x2APIC support when it loads.

ChannelInterleaving.Description: Select this option to modify the level of interleaving for which the memory system is configured.

MaxMemBusFreqMHz.Description: Select this option to to configure the maximum speed at which the memory runs.

AdvancedMemProtection.Description: Select this option to configure additional memory protection with ECC (Error Checking and Correcting).
